content.detailedDescription:
Bonjour, 

notre observation a eu lieu le 1er aoã»t 2016 entre 23 h et minuit, aux coordonnã©es suivantes : 47â°01'31.9"n 72â°28'38.2"w. sous un ciel sans lune et totalement dã©gagã©, dans le ciel de la zec tawachiche au quã©bec, moi, ma femme et mon garã§on de 24 ans venions observions des persã©ides et mãªme de voir un bolide traversant le ciel dâ€™ouest vers lâ€™est. en scrutant le ciel ã  la recherche dâ€™autres ã©toiles filantes ou bolides, une lumiã¨re se dã©plaã§ant trã¨s haute dans le ciel a attirã© notre attention. il y avait une lumiã¨re qui venait de lâ€™est et se dirigeait vers lâ€™ouest et qui ressemblait ã  un passage normal de satellite. soudainement la lumiã¨re est devenue plus brillante comme cela arrive parfois avec le reflet du soleil sur les panneaux solaires des satellites ou de la station mir. soudainement la lumiã¨re sâ€™est mis ã  scintiller juste avant de faire des bons instantanã©s en ligne droite dâ€™assez longue distance en disparaissant pour rã©apparaã®tre plus loin pour ensuite changer de direction ã  angle droit vers le nord, la lumiã¨re a ensuite stoppã© net et a changã© ã  nouveau de direction, mais cette fois-ci vers le sud, totalement ã  lâ€™opposã© tout-en dâ€™ã©crivant un arc dans le ciel mais ã  moindre vitesse et distance. la lumiã¨re ã  fait un autre bon toujours en directions sud pour ensuite faire un dernier bon en ligne droite toujours dans la mãªme direction et de disparaã®tre pour ne plus le revoir cette nuit-lã .

nous avons observã© ce mãªme phã©nomã¨ne ã  deux autres reprises soit le 2 et le 3 aoã»t suivant et toujours dans les mãªmes conditions mã©tã©orologiques. la provenance de la lumiã¨re ã©tait sensiblement la mãªme. donc la lumiã¨re se dã©plaã§ait dâ€™est en ouest et toujours en faisant des bons rectilignes, mais cette fois-ci, la lumiã¨re faisait aussi des bons de haut en bas ã  angle droit. par la suite elle a continuã© son chemin pour disparaã®tre en une autre fraction de seconde.

pour la premiã¨re fois de ma vie, je ne pouvais expliquer ã  mon ã©pouse et ã  mon garã§on ce que nous venions de voir (dâ€™observer) dans le ciel.

p. -s. jâ€™aimerais bien savoir ce que nous avons observã©.

cordialement!
content.summary: Ressemblait ã  un satellite qui passe dans le ciel avec des dã©placements que nos satellites, avions ou drones sont incapables de faire.

content.detailedDescription: Had been to ocean isle isle beach for about 5 mornings in row, to be honest was looking for ufos, had been meditating each time for some sort of contact. i am a auto tech with a extreem ability to diagnose and repair problems. so i am very critical about things. went out in surf about knee deep to take pics of sturgeon full moon. did not see the object with naked eye. however had a feeling of something like a knowing that something was going to happen. looked at pics a long time, thought was lens flare but now dont think so.
content.summary: Was at beach to see sturgeon and possible lunar eclipse, took two pics of moon, did not see it with naked eye

content.detailedDescription: This pictures i took in my everyday walking. at home when i magnified the pictures i saw objects that i cannot identify. so i let it to you in case they are of significance. they are only visible when magnified.
content.summary: Camera pictures. saw objects when magnifying pictures

content.detailedDescription:
During my daily walk at 7:00 pm i was taking pictures of beautiful sun setting, i took several pictures in diferent angles. i was surprised when i got home and start watching those pictures. i saw a black dot in the first picture and when i amplify i saw an object that i was unable to identify. i kept amplifying the rest of the pictures and what was my surprise there where black dots perfectly aligned three in one row and four others around them. at first i thought it could be technical problems of camera shooting but after going to a camera place they told me that those dots appeared because there where something there otherwise it would not show them. so i leave it to your knowledge. but if they mean something is scary how many they are. and if me with a phone can see that, government which
has much resources can easily detect them. some years ago i shared with you an experience that i had when i was 15 years old in sierra maestra mountains in cuba in 1960 at approx 5,000 ft over sea level at 5:00 am i saw round sphere lights at a distance of 1 klm. they where more than 10 and they where moving from one place to the other at speeds that made me understand that it wasn't nothing we knew at that time. the mountain bottom goes straight inside the sea. so in the coast line is very deep. 
so respectfully i am sending this photos for your analisys. remember you have to magnify them in order to see what i mentioned. hoping it would help in some way and please let me know your analysis. thanks
content.summary: Camera pictures magnifyng it objects appears

content.detailedDescription: It was a summers day around 2pm or so and my parents and i lived in a roural part of town. we were going to go into town and as we drove off our property and down the road we only tarveled for about 300 feet or so and there was a house on the corner of dewdney trunk rd, in mission.As we turned the corner i was looking out the window and saw it. i yelled at my step dad to stop the truck and as he pulled over i jumped out and as to my amasement it was hovering right above a house it seemed to be about 20 or so feet above but it could have been more. it was solid black triangl with a snub nose and it had 3 bright lightson each of its corners. the texture on the side of it was like if you take a fork and scower the side of it by pulling it down it was texered like that.I remember my step dad saying that it was some kind of military craft and i told him no way because it never made a sound.It just hovered there and it was so quiet.I staired at it for about 3 or4 minits and i was not afraid at all, kind of like it was calling to me as i wanted to stay and admire it more and even to approach it when my dad told me to get into the truck now! and i didn't want to.,but i did and we drove way. i guess my dad was scared because when we came home a few hours later he went another way home,and i then walked down the street and went were it was and it was gone.I was disapointed, but i remember it as it was yesterday. thanks from rick.
content.summary: I got my step dad to stop truck i jumped out and saw it plain as day hovering for about 3 min or so.

content.detailedDescription:
Exited my home with girlfriend. looked up at stars like i do every night. saw one star begin to move from north to south. girlfriend suggested it was a plane. but we see planes and they have a red light bleeping. see planes every night. was not a plane.
this thing looked exactly like venus. size, color. just it flew in a straight line.
content.summary: Saw what we thought was a star. then, it started moving, leaving the other stars behind.

content.detailedDescription:
1) evening around 9:30.
2) got by chance
3) no lights just under it so could be reflection, but to reflect light there has to be some object in sky
4) no plane at that time in that area 
5) curved object

i have the original picture. this could be little low resolution as i trasferred to my computer then post it
content.summary: Suddenly got it while taking picture of lights, no shooting star or plane, no light reflection from ground.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was home and i had the feeling i'll see something like many times before.
2) first i notice a plane that was taking off and behind it another object with the same size and overall body shape without wings and much more reflective then the plane.
3) i've seen this object 4 or 5 times in last 6 months and many more times other objects. no matter what i think about the object at the end will be speculation about its nature. what matter to me is, why they are not hiding anymore? why they are most of the time over big cities? what is the purpose of all of this?
4) basically the object was taking off like a regular plane first i saw it around 30 degrees above horizon and it was movie 60 degrees ne after i was sure it's not a plane or helicopter a ran to get my camera after i came back it was not there, i ran to the other side of the building and i took the images. all event from first sighting to end where i made the images was about around  1 min. the object was a lot more faster then a plane and in a much higher altetude for a plane can make for 1min.
5) like i set, i've seen those ufos for very long time almost every day or week if i look to the sky. i was just happy that finally i manage to take the image no matter how good it is. i know i can feel them and i know when to look. it can be instinct of self-preservation, good six sense or whatever. most of the time i always look at the right time. they are there they are showing more often.
6) well... it' just disappeared to cloud.

i'm providing you jpg copy of the original raw cr2 images.
i won't be providing cr2 images with the raw meta data to you because of copy right terms.

i'm giving you rights over the jpg images as a proof and your own research. we can keep this conversation open if you like to know or ask something more.
content.summary: Took off like plane then dissolve to cloud

content.detailedDescription:
September 13, 2001. two days prior the world changed. all flights were still grounded, and no one was sure what was going on. my friends and i got together in the afternoon at my home to talk about what had happened. we were sitting out on the deck in the backyard. weather wise, it was a typical, bright yet overcast day. my friend j. was looking up at the evergreens on our property and noticed something grey and dull. i looked up and saw it as well, it was very similar to a hornets nest, that is what i first noticed. in fact, that is what i first thought it was, but things didn't make sense. i asked allowed something like, "if that is a giant hornet's nest, how come there are no branches holding it up there?" my friend k. responded, "it's above the trees." 

we watched mesmerized by this thing. it hovered there, it didn't make a sound. it had gotten oddly quiet as no birds could be heard at all. for being within a metro city area, we had already noted how the lack of flying airplanes over the area, and the limited amount of people traveling with everyday traffic, made the world feel as though it was holding it's breath. 

the craft just hovered in the sky, it was easy to see, where the surface of an actual hornets nest will have a horizontal texture, this had a smooth, metallic appearance, sectioned off in 3 parts. the center was larger than the side sections. the longer we watched it, the more we could see. we moved throughout the yard to try and make sense of it. it never moved. 

where it hovered, if it was any known aircraft, it would have been obvious. it appeared to be floating no more than 250ft above the ground. even at that distance, if it had been a hot air balloon, you still would have been able to identify it as such. no basket, no sound. smooth, dull metal, with no visible windows, doors, or creatures. my friends and i tried to find the number to the portland international airport, as we wanted to alert them to something in the sky, as we didn't ever get the sense of danger, and we didn't want to call 9-1-1, as to report a ufo as police and first responders were for real emergencies, like what had happened on the east coast. but it was the fact that, when there was suppose to be absolutely nothing in the sky, here was this craft, defying logic, physics, and current military and civilian protocol, during a point in time where anything odd, would just cause a panic, that craft will stay in my mind, as clear as looking at a picture, for the rest of my life.

after am easy 20 minutes of trying to figure this think out, it blinked out of sight.
content.summary: Bee-hive appears in sky, day time sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in hadley, ma on the banks of the conn. river sitting after having put my little kids to sleep in a tent.  i came out to gaze and calm before bed. just after having several strong thoughts about my love and 8 years of research, on the topic, i thought: why am i not more excited? i am even going to a ufo convention in me this weekend

a second later i look out and saw a glowing, pulsating, stationary  circle. it was far away and about the size we a star to be but it was pink, green/ white and changing. my first thought was they heard my thoughts. 

i took pictures and stared at it but it never moved.  but went slightly out of existence a few times. i decided to go to bed and meditate. i never saw it disappear. i am excited
content.summary: Just after having several strong thoughts about my love and 8 year research on the topic i look out and saw a glowing, pulsating, stationary  circle.  i took pictures and stared at it but it never moved but went slightly out of exsistence a few times

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside of work at 3am for my usual smoke break. i walked to my normal spot for smoking and noticed a very bright orange light in the sky unlike anything i had ever seen before. the brightness of it was what got my attention, the way it was glowing and the color made it look like a street light, but i've never seen one that way and this thing looked way too big for that.

my first thought was that it may be the moon behind cloud cover, but the moon was almost directly above me at the time and there was no cloud cover that night. i still haven't thought of anything else it might be.

i couldn't make out any features on the object, as it was very dark and the object was far enough away that i wouldn't be able to see any details on it. the lights on it seemed to cover up any details i might have noticed. i had my phone out and was recording video of it, and when i was zoomed in i noticed it looked like two separate lights with a small gap in between them. the whole time it was here, it never moved. after about a minute, the object began to shrink and gradually turned pure white. after about two minutes, the object faded away and i lost sight of it.

a couple hours before the sighting, while in the office i started feeling uneasy. it felt like something was watching me from just out of sight, and i felt like i was in danger, and that something bad had happened, or was about to happen. i have never felt like that at work before and ignored it and followed my usual routine. this feeling persisted from roughly 9pm to around midnight. when i saw the object, my first reaction was that feeling of fear, but it was quickly replaced by a feeling that i needed to record as much of this as i possibly could. after the object disappeared, i felt strangely calm and peaceful for the rest of the night.

i lost sight of the object when it slowly faded away roughly two minutes after i first saw it. i'm not sure if it was still there but out of sight, or how long it had been there before i saw it. shortly after it disappeared, i heard several loud popping noises in quick succession from its direction, but i am not sure if the sounds are related to the object or not.

do note that the video i have attached contains profanity, and i do not know anything about editing videos.
content.summary: Bright orange light in the sky, appeared to be two separate lights when zoomed in. both shaped in straight lines.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone to bed and was looking out the window when i observed a moving brilliant white light moving accross the sky. the light was of such high intensity, and by it's movement, i knew it was not a star, flare, satelite, or aircraft landing light etc,. my field of vision only allowed me to view it for about 30 seconds. it tracked in a straight line and emitted no sound.
about two minutes after the siteing i could hear a jet aircraft. it appeared to me that jet was attempting to investigate the moving light.

for credibility sake, i am a retired commerial rated pilot.
content.summary: Brilliant white light orb observed moving across the sky from west to east. no sound was emitted.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and just heading out for a walk with my two children on the drive. looking up sw above the trees i saw two white cylinder shaped objects moving north horizontally for a few seconds. they moved off behind some clouds as disappeared. no noise was heard. i pointed to the objects and told my daughter to look. i think she missed them. i then went back inside and got my binoculars and smartphone just in case i saw them again, but did not. the objects were flying close together and would not be planes. the local planes you can here clearly but these were silent.
content.summary: Noticed two cigar shaped objects flying horizontally for a few seconds before they disappeared behind the clouds. i'd not see them again  as it was cloudy.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road around 10-10:30 at night on august 22, 2016. i saw this bright red light in the sky and i just figured it was a plane or something along those lines. the light then began to blink and move around. i started paying much more attention to the light rather than the road. next thing i know i wake up in my car parked in a parking lot near my house and it's after 12 am. i have no idea what had happened or even how i got there but i felt scared at first. i came home and realized i felt achy and my back really hurt but nothing severe. i don't feel unsafe or harmed but i do feel a little bit off. i know i don't feel off as in i'm not myself, i feel off as in i feel more like myself again. i'm hoping that overtime i will start to remember bits and pieces but as of right not i'm not really sure what happened.
content.summary: I saw a bright red light and i ended up waking up in a parking lot near my house hours later.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the driving to the gas station in a car with my wife who was the driver. we witnessed 5-6 orange orb like, stationary orange flickering and or shimmering objects.  observed then for a min or two while we drove. i when in to the gas station and on our way back we decided to take a closer look. lights were in the same place all the starts around the objects looked normal. after another min or two of viewing the objects one disappeared and reappeared a long distance away in a more western location. we noted a very large amount of planes in the area and one helicopter. one of the planes was flying extremely fast and appeared to have a very small wing span and was dark in color with 2 large white lights on its belly.
content.summary: Orange flickering light formations

content.detailedDescription:
Two of us in bacalar, mexico.  looking for persides shower remains and commenting on how the sky was overcast and the 'urban glow' of chetemal was not prominent tonight.

could still see the milky way and orion almost above and to the ne.  

we were facing ne.  saw a flashing streak, high and off my right shoulder at two o'clock, about three flashes in a second.  at first thought it was meteor.   it traveled in a straight line and approached the horizon directly in front of us in the ne, at about a forty five degree approach angle. when it was about a 'thumbs width' above the horizon, it did a 90 degree turn and headed to a point about 45 degrees above the horizon to my 10:30 o'clock position, while flashing about six times.

it was then behind some tree limbs, but appeared to stay in place, but still flashed. the flash was three in a second, followed by two to three seconds of no flashing.

the object then appeared to head directly away from us, going north while flashing three times
content.summary: Rhymthic pulsing streak, 90 turn, maybe hovered, then left with 'back' to us

content.detailedDescription:
I came outside of my home to smoke. i always scan the sky when i come outside, since i saw another object approximately four years ago.
this one was in the east by north east sky at around 45 degrees from the horizon. it looked like some planets in the sky have looked at night this last year (as they have been on a close approach)only it was full daylight and the clouds passed behind it. it was bright white. i could not tell if this was from light it was giving off or from reflection of the soon to be setting sun on a white surface. clouds passed behind it. 
after it had been sitting there in the same position for about five minutes my six yo son came out and i had him go get his mom. they both returned and we watched it together for about fifteen more minutes. it did not move. then i ran inside and got our cell phone to record it and our eleven yo daughter. unfortunately, the phone did not pick up the image. i don't understand why it did not, unless it was just that the phone's camera is not of good enough quality.
clouds continued to pass behind it. it started to seem to drift but was moving against the wind. it moved slowly and as it did so it either lost intensity of light or was moving away from the earth. it seemed to fade. it did not stay moving in the same direction though. it seemed to drift around the area it was in for a while and then really started to fade as it moved directly east. at about the same time it would have gone behind the tree line it had completely faded from sight.
that was it. i am not aware of any man made objects that act like it did but i did not feel the intense fear that the other sighting i had gave me. i was terrified that time. this time i was simply curious and excited.
i feel very fortunate to have had another sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object was in the e-ne sky. looked to be white or shining white light. it hovered for about 20 mins then slowly drifted about. eventually faded away.

content.detailedDescription: I and multiple witnesses including an nypd officer and pilot have been seeing multiple objects over the past two years. they have appeared at all times of the night sky throughout the year. they very in briteness like the stars in the sky. they appere to be very high in the atmosphere. they very in speed from extreme to moderate. they travel in straight lines, some to the horizon others seem to fade out into the atmosphere. none make a sound. they have been observed with the naked eye and with high powered binoculars. no witnesses have been able to identify theses objects. all have been astonished and perplexed.
content.summary: Brite starlike object high in the atmosphere traveling at a high rate of speed moving from west to east making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned to my hotel room from eating dinner and took a few pictures of the sunset.  when i looked at them is when i noticed a green ufo at the top of the photos.
content.summary: Interesting.

content.detailedDescription: J'ã©tais ã  regarder la tã©lã©vision lorsque ma fille m'a demandã© de la rejoindre sur la galerie avant pour constater avec elle cet ã©trange  objet lumineux je suis sortis pour constater un ã©vã©nement incomprã©hensible une boule lumineuse qui filait a vive allure a un altitude difficile a evaluer et pour voir une seconde boule lumineuse sortir de par derriã¨re la premiã¨re boule et la suivre le tout le plus silencieusement aucun bruit le silence complet ! elles se sont perdues ã  l'horizon
content.summary: Boules lumineuses et silencieuses une derriã¨re l'autre ã  quelques secondes d'intervalle

content.detailedDescription: I was on my bike and i seen a cloud that looked cool so i decided to take a picture and i didnt even look at the pictures for a couple of days after i took them but i noticed a few things there was two disck and a lightuining bolt that seemed to be getting closrer to me
content.summary: Ufo with lightining bolt

content.detailedDescription:
We were leaving a picnic at a local park and another person noticed a object metallic very shiny hovering very high in sky. we noticed a low scattered cloud cover approx 5000ft i estimate the cloud height by a airliner leaving albany passing thru the scattered clouds.
the object hovered there i have seen planets before and am positive this was not a planet or star. the observation took place around  7pm in june we watch it for approx 30 mins before we left.
content.summary: Saw a metalic object hovering in sky for aprox 30 minst

content.detailedDescription:
I was going out back for a cigarette, when i saw this bright white light above the tree line.  as i frequently watch the stars, i knew it wasn't supposed to be there, and i got very excited.  this thing was big, about 4mm tall, and trapezoidal with the top about 2mm and the bottom about 3 mm.  i watched for about 15 seconds as red, green and blue lights blinked randomly.  i went inside and got my wife and 20 year old son.  as the 3 of us observed the object, it started to dart left and back to the right about half a dozen times.  after hovering motionless for a couple minutes, it shot down and back up again 3 times.  it then started to move in fast, tight circles for about 5 seconds before returning to its original position.  or at least as near as i could tell.  after several minutes of inactivity, my wife started googling while my son and i continued to watch.  over the next 1/2 hour, my son and i watched it through binoculars and tried to get it on film, but our cameras were inadequate for the low light levels.  also over that same time span, it slowly drifted to the north and farther away.  this i discern from its shrinking size.  about 40 minutes after first observing it, it grew too small to see.  
when i first saw it, i was excited.  then when it started moving...Giddy might best describe my feelings.  disappointment when it was gone.  
over the next 4 nights, the 18th through the 21st, we have observed as many as 9 of these lighted, blinking objects.  on the 19th we had an additional observer, a friend from town.  based on this, i have every reason to believe they will be back tonight.  additional report(s), to follow, hopefully we'll get some pictures/video.
content.summary: Bright white light, with randomly  pulsating red, green and blue lights.  hovered above tree line, then moved left and retrieve get several times.  then moved up and down several times.  then it slowly drifted north as it moved west until it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
in the fall of 1989 i left for work with my wife from swan hills for the 3 hour dr. to red earth creek. leaving at five 3 am to be at work for 630 was a common thing  i know it would've been thursday  in the early morning hours .  there was no clouds in a decent mood light the moon was behind us . we pulled out of town i was about to make the right-hand turn when i noticed something hovering in an open cut line almost level with me about 150 yards from the road . i remember my wife was digging through her purse to make sure she had her id and her wallet . i remarked what i was looking at you she looked up and we both exclaimed there's something i've never seen before she quoted what the hell is that ?  hovering about 30 feet above the trees was a disc shaped dark item surrounded by an outer ring of lights that looked about 5 feet apart.  i knew it was rotating because the multicoloured lights on the outer ring when i could see one disappear on the left side of the craft a new one would appear on the right side i open the door to my truck which upset my wife tremendously . i explained to her that i didn't want to see it through window i wanted to see it with my own eyes i leaned out the truck door with my feet on the pavement and watched it for approximately three minutes the craft stayed right where it was the whole time .  i could hear a very low frequency him when i was outside the truck i shut the lights off in the truck and the second i did that it travelled west away for me at a high rate of speed and disappeared from view in about two seconds .  i have never actually reported this incident although it has definitely changed my views on extraterrestrial life i always said you can't tell me what i saw with my own eyes .  many years later i was talking to my ex-wife and i wanted to see if her recollection of that night was the same as mine and they are exactly the same mine with a little more detail because i think it affected me a little bit deeper than her .

 i work in the area again now 20 years later and i look up at the sky all night during night shifts.

 i could still photograph the area and give detailed maps of its location and it's direction of travel if need be .
content.summary: I drive by the site daily. i still look every time.

content.detailedDescription: On the way back home from an appointment, i spotted an object over a small dark cloud. pointing to it, i asked my mom, "what is that?" she saw it in the sky as well, and we both freaked out a little bit. it was saucer shaped, with a silver body, white dome top, and black bottom. it was far away and up high so it seemed small from our point of view, but it was easily in our vision. it simply stayed above the cloud, not moving. it was a very quick event, no longer than 10 seconds before we lost sight of it. we were driving and trees blocked our view very soon after we saw it, and when the trees cleared, i pulled my phone out to take a picture, but it was absolutely nowhere to be seen. the object completely disappeared from the time we lost it behind the trees to when we could have seen it again- we couldn't find it at all- we even slowed to see if we were just going too fast go see it. it was just gone.
content.summary: Saucer hovering over small cloud. white some top and black bottom. two witnesses involved.

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling east along the a66 approx 8 miles from scotch corner when i noticed a cluster of lights on the south west horizon, i think looking towards skelton.  at first i thought the closest resemblance i could think of was a squadron of helicopters with lights on.  however after a good few miles they hadn't moved at all and i managed to take a photograph and video.  it wasn't a great day for visibility and i couldn't make anything else out other than the lights and their apparent lack of movement.  i was mystified at the time and still am, especially after seeing the video again.  lanterns, flares etc have all been suggested but the absolute lack of movement still leaves me skeptical of this explanation.  i eventually lost sight as i passed over a hill and couldn't see the same patch of sky.
content.summary: Travelling east along a66 8 miles from scotch corner and witnessed stationary lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling east along the a66 approx 8 miles from scotch corner when i noticed a cluster of lights on the south west horizon, i think looking towards skelton.  at first i thought the closest resemblance i could think of was a squadron of helicopters with lights on.  however after a good few miles they hadn't moved at all and i managed to take a photograph and video.  it wasn't a great day for visibility and i couldn't make anything else out other than the lights and their apparent lack of movement.  i was mystified at the time and still am, especially after seeing the video again.  lanterns, flares etc have all been suggested but the absolute lack of movement still leaves me skeptical of this explanation.  i eventually lost sight as i passed over a hill and couldn't see the same patch of sky.
content.summary: Travelling east along a66 8 miles from scotch corner and witnessed stationary lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in bedroom with my pregnant girlfriend when i just had a feeling to look out the window when i did to my far right i noticed a bright sphere in the distance which was strange ive never seen anything like or since it wasnt the moon.Then i went downstairs in tge back garden looked at it and then i see triangle shaped craft moving slowly but soundless from by the white orb thing it was flashing in sequence red white blue the flash was straight lined with coulour when it flashed red white blue tgen i noticed about 5 more in the distance they were moving slow but going the same way as tge other one all flashing the same i thought it was strange and tge night was very silent i shouted my girl to come and have a look but she got scared and wouldnt come down i dont know what this was but its stuck wot me at that time i wasnt really interested in ufos but now i feel like im more obsessed with it and would love to know what it was also my dog was strangely quiet and wouldnt come in the back which was strange i couldnt even remeber seeing her she must of been hiding or sleeping not sure she died tge following year from a tumour in her mouth up to her nose at the time i seen the crafts i was excited and scared also felt like it was going on for 10 min or more i just seen them go off in the distance and that was that i have had other paranormal encounters also so it is strange thanks for reading .
content.summary: Bright white sphere then noticed triangles moving slow red whit blue flashing noticed one tgen more after no sound travelled from right to left

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling east along the a66 approx 8 miles from scotch corner when i noticed a cluster of lights on the south west horizon, i think looking towards skelton.  at first i thought the closest resemblance i could think of was a squadron of helicopters with lights on.  however after a good few miles they hadn't moved at all and i managed to take a photograph and video.  it wasn't a great day for visibility and i couldn't make anything else out other than the lights and their apparent lack of movement.  i was mystified at the time and still am, especially after seeing the video again.  lanterns, flares etc have all been suggested but the absolute lack of movement still leaves me skeptical of this explanation.  i eventually lost sight as i passed over a hill and couldn't see the same patch of sky.
content.summary: Travelling east along a66 8 miles from scotch corner and witnessed stationary lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Anyone could have seen it it low just a few inches above a house too low for it to be a plane no plane would be that low.  i know a plane when i see one cause you can see the wings and planes are long.  

feelings fine no reactions no actions during the sighting i felt fine and calm.

on some sightings with lines across them ufo i felt weak like it doing something to me.

didn't think to look for ufos then wasn't on my mind nor drinking no on anything i'm clean from drinking beer and drugs.  

i just ticked lights cause there nothing none.  

don't know about degrees just guessed with degrees.
content.summary: Black square shaped something on each end couldn't see what
